thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express Earls Court - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A very nice stay
thread.title_full: A very nice stay - Review of Holiday Inn Express Earls Court, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MJWRGW
title: A very nice stay
text: We stayed here for a Saturday night. The rooms were clean and well equipped and the beds were very comfortable. The bathroom was clean. The guys in reception were really helpful - even though it was very busy - Neil especially so. Other members of staff were polite and friendly. The breakfast was a little disappointing - there was only a combination of scrambled egg, beans, bacon and sausage and the quality was not very good. The location was ideal for us for walking to Stamford Bridge - 20 minute walk, and the nearest underground station at West Kensington was just a 10 minute walk. Overall a nice stay - if only the breakfast was better it would have been great.
